m_szDocTitle: Patent WO2001089009A1 - METHOD FOR IMPROVING THE PROPERTIES OF ALLOY POWDERS FOR NiMH BATTERIES - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: METHOD FOR IMPROVING THE PROPERTIES OF ALLOY POWDERS FOR NiMH BATTERIES WO 2001089009 A1 Abstract The invention concerns a method of improving the properties of a hydrogen storage alloy powder for a negative electrode of a rechargeable nickel hydride battery. The method comprises the steps of hydriding a powdered alloy starting material, oxidising the obtained hydride alloy powder and washing the oxidised powder. The invention also concerns the obtained powder. Claims(1) 1. A method of improving the properties of a hydrogen storage alloy powder for a negative electrode of a rechargeable nickel
